name: Super Space Pirate
description:
Super Space Pirates is a retro 2D space shooter coded entirely in Python.

The goal of this game project is to create a classic top-down shooter with an enemy AI that rivals human players in all ways ... including making mistakes.
Please donate to support this project if you'd like to see more. 

Please note this project is being developed by a 1 person team who's currently only using their spare time to develop and work on this game.
This game has only been in development for less than a month and your donation could help turn this into a full-time project and allow them to dedicate more time to the game's development.
All assets including the font used and spaceships are currently just placeholder assets and will be replaced with original art.
